com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download

Interface DownloadContracts.Handlerable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DownloadInstructions.HandlerableHander
    Enclosing class:
    DownloadContracts

    public static interface DownloadContracts.Handlerable
    An abstraction of a android.os.Handle which makes possible the writing of unitary tests.

    Any implementing class is supposed run a command in the User Interface thread.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean post(java.lang.Runnable runnnable)
      Is supposed to run the given command in the UI thread.

    • Method Detail

      • post

        boolean post(java.lang.Runnable runnnable)
        Is supposed to run the given command in the UI thread.
        Parameters:
        runnnable - the command that should be executed
        Returns:
        true if and only if the execution in the UI thread has actually successfuly started
